description: Do you want to create a blog, but you aren't sure how to get started? Thanks to Wordpress.com, it has never been easier! Many other courses are offering this knowledge in exchange for hours, days, or weeks of your time. In this course, after just 1 jam-packed hour, you will learn how to get your blog started, customize it, create content, and promote it to your future readers! You will also learn the tips and tricks of how to turn your blog into a must-read. I look forward to seeing your new blog!
title: Learn How to Create a Wordpress Blog in 1 Hour
